ayahs.textUthmani: ۞ وَمَآ أُبَرِّئُ نَفْسِىٓ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلنَّفْسَ لَأَمَّارَةٌۢ بِٱلسُّوٓءِ إِلَّا مَا رَحِمَ رَبِّىٓ ۚ إِنَّ رَبِّى غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: ۞ وَمَآ [And not] أُبَرِّئُ [I absolve] نَفْسِىٓ ۚ [myself] إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلنَّفْسَ [the soul] لَأَمَّارَةٌۢ [(is) a certain enjoiner] بِٱلسُّوٓءِ [of evil] إِلَّا [unless] مَا [[that]] رَحِمَ [bestows Mercy] رَبِّىٓ ۚ [my Lord] إِنَّ [Indeed] رَبِّى [my Lord] غَفُورٌۭ [(is) Oft-Forgiving] رَّحِيمٌۭ [Most Merciful]
ayahs.transliteration: Wama obarri-o nafsee inna annafsalaammaratun bissoo-i illa ma rahimarabbee inna rabbee ghafoorun raheem

ayahs.textUthmani: وَقَالَ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱئْتُونِى بِهِۦٓ أَسْتَخْلِصْهُ لِنَفْسِى ۖ فَلَمَّا كَلَّمَهُۥ قَالَ إِنَّكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ لَدَيْنَا مَكِينٌ أَمِينٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَقَالَ [And said] ٱلْمَلِكُ [the king] ٱئْتُونِى [Bring him to me] بِهِۦٓ [Bring him to me] أَسْتَخْلِصْهُ [I will select him] لِنَفْسِى ۖ [for myself] فَلَمَّا [Then when] كَلَّمَهُۥ [he spoke to him] قَالَ [he said] إِنَّكَ [Indeed, you] ٱلْيَوْمَ [(are) today] لَدَيْنَا [with us] مَكِينٌ [firmly established] أَمِينٌۭ [(and) trusted]
ayahs.transliteration: Waqala almaliku i/toonee bihiastakhlishu linafsee falamma kallamahu qalainnaka alyawma ladayna makeenun ameen

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ ٱجْعَلْنِى عَلَىٰ خَزَآئِنِ ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ إِنِّى حَفِيظٌ عَلِيمٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] ٱجْعَلْنِى [Appoint me] عَلَىٰ [over] خَزَآئِنِ [(the) treasuries] ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ [(of) the land] إِنِّى [Indeed, I] حَفِيظٌ [(will be) a guardian] عَلِيمٌۭ [knowing]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala ijAAalnee AAala khaza-inial-ardi innee hafeethun AAaleem

ayahs.textUthmani: وَكَذَٰلِكَ مَكَّنَّا لِيُوسُفَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَتَبَوَّأُ مِنْهَا حَيْثُ يَشَآءُ ۚ نُصِيبُ بِرَحْمَتِنَا مَن نَّشَآءُ ۖ وَلَا نُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَكَذَٰلِكَ [And thus] مَكَّنَّا [We established] لِيُوسُفَ [[to] Yusuf] فِى [in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the land] يَتَبَوَّأُ [to settle] مِنْهَا [therein] حَيْثُ [where ever] يَشَآءُ ۚ [he willed] نُصِيبُ [We bestow] بِرَحْمَتِنَا [Our Mercy] مَن [(on) whom] نَّشَآءُ ۖ [We will] وَلَا [And not] نُضِيعُ [We let go waste] أَجْرَ [(the) reward] ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ [(of) the good-doers]
ayahs.transliteration: Wakathalika makanna liyoosufafee al-ardi yatabawwao minha haythu yashaonuseebu birahmatina man nashao walanudeeAAu ajra almuhsineen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَأَجْرُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ خَيْرٌ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ يَتَّقُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَأَجْرُ [And surely (the) reward] ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ [(of) the Hereafter] خَيْرٌۭ [(is) better] لِّلَّذِينَ [for those who] ءَامَنُوا۟ [believe] وَكَانُوا۟ [and are] يَتَّقُونَ [God conscious]
ayahs.transliteration: Walaajru al-akhirati khayrun lillatheenaamanoo wakanoo yattaqoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَجَآءَ إِخْوَةُ يُوسُفَ فَدَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَعَرَفَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَجَآءَ [And came] إِخْوَةُ [(the) brothers] يُوسُفَ [(of) Yusuf] فَدَخَلُوا۟ [and they entered] عَلَيْهِ [upon him] فَعَرَفَهُمْ [and he recognized them] وَهُمْ [but they] لَهُۥ [knew him not] مُنكِرُونَ [knew him not]
ayahs.transliteration: Wajaa ikhwatu yoosufa fadakhalooAAalayhi faAAarafahum wahum lahu munkiroon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَمَّا جَهَّزَهُم بِجَهَازِهِمْ قَالَ ٱئْتُونِى بِأَخٍ لَّكُم مِّنْ أَبِيكُمْ ۚ أَلَا تَرَوْنَ أَنِّىٓ أُوفِى ٱلْكَيْلَ وَأَنَا۠ خَيْرُ ٱلْمُنزِلِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَمَّا [And when] جَهَّزَهُم [he had furnished them] بِجَهَازِهِمْ [with their supplies] قَالَ [he said] ٱئْتُونِى [Bring to me] بِأَخٍۢ [a brother] لَّكُم [of yours] مِّنْ [from] أَبِيكُمْ ۚ [your father] أَلَا [Do not] تَرَوْنَ [you see] أَنِّىٓ [that I] أُوفِى [[I] give full] ٱلْكَيْلَ [[the] measure] وَأَنَا۠ [and that I am] خَيْرُ [(the) best] ٱلْمُنزِلِينَ [(of) the hosts]
ayahs.transliteration: Walamma jahhazahum bijahazihimqala i/toonee bi-akhin lakum min abeekum alatarawna annee oofee alkayla waana khayru almunzileen

ayahs.textUthmani: فَإِن لَّمْ تَأْتُونِى بِهِۦ فَلَا كَيْلَ لَكُمْ عِندِى وَلَا تَقْرَبُونِ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَإِن [But if] لَّمْ [not] تَأْتُونِى [you bring him to me] بِهِۦ [you bring him to me] فَلَا [then (there will be) no] كَيْلَ [measure] لَكُمْ [for you] عِندِى [from me] وَلَا [and not] تَقْرَبُونِ [you will come near me]
ayahs.transliteration: Fa-in lam ta/toonee bihi fala kaylalakum AAindee wala taqraboon

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالُوا۟ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنْهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَـٰعِلُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالُوا۟ [They said] سَنُرَٰوِدُ [We will try to get permission] عَنْهُ [for him] أَبَاهُ [(from) his father] وَإِنَّا [and indeed we] لَفَـٰعِلُونَ [surely will do]

words.translation: We will try to get permission

ayahs.textUthmani: وَقَالَ لِفِتْيَـٰنِهِ ٱجْعَلُوا۟ بِضَـٰعَتَهُمْ فِى رِحَالِهِمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَعْرِفُونَهَآ إِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَقَالَ [And he said] لِفِتْيَـٰنِهِ [to his servants] ٱجْعَلُوا۟ [Put] بِضَـٰعَتَهُمْ [their merchandise] فِى [in] رِحَالِهِمْ [their saddlebags] لَعَلَّهُمْ [so that they] يَعْرِفُونَهَآ [may recognize it] إِذَا [when] ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ [they go back] إِلَىٰٓ [to] أَهْلِهِمْ [their people] لَعَلَّهُمْ [so that they may] يَرْجِعُونَ [return]
ayahs.transliteration: Waqala lifityanihi ijAAaloo bidaAAatahumfee rihalihim laAAallahum yaAArifoonaha ithainqalaboo ila ahlihim laAAallahum yarjiAAoon

ayahs.textUthmani: فَلَمَّا رَجَعُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِيهِمْ قَالُوا۟ يَـٰٓأَبَانَا مُنِعَ مِنَّا ٱلْكَيْلُ فَأَرْسِلْ مَعَنَآ أَخَانَا نَكْتَلْ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَـٰفِظُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَلَمَّا [So when] رَجَعُوٓا۟ [they returned] إِلَىٰٓ [to] أَبِيهِمْ [their father] قَالُوا۟ [they said] يَـٰٓأَبَانَا [O our father] مُنِعَ [Has been denied] مِنَّا [to us] ٱلْكَيْلُ [the measure] فَأَرْسِلْ [so send] مَعَنَآ [with us] أَخَانَا [our brother] نَكْتَلْ [(that) we will get measure] وَإِنَّا [And indeed, we] لَهُۥ [for him] لَحَـٰفِظُونَ [(will) surely (be) guardians]
ayahs.transliteration: Falamma rajaAAoo ila abeehim qalooya abana muniAAa minna alkaylufaarsil maAAana akhana naktal wa-innalahu lahafithoon
